item.title: Kindbody 的故事：E4，试管婴儿达到销售目标（播客）
item.description: 公司内部文件显示，Kindbody 实施配额制，要求医生执行利润更高的手术。在 "试管婴儿中断 "的第 4 集《Kindbody 的故事》中，患者报告说他们被推向昂贵的试管婴儿周期和可疑的附加项目：Kindbody 的故事》中，患者反映被推向昂贵的试管婴儿周期和可疑的附加项目。【原文：Kindbody implements quotas requiring doctors to perform more lucrative procedures, internal company documents show. In Episode 4 of IVF Disrupted: The Kindbody Story, patients report being pushed toward expensive IVF cycles and questionable add-ons.】

item.title: 苹果开发类似 ChatGPT 的应用程序，帮助测试改版后的 Siri
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，苹果公司已经开发出一款类似于 ChatGPT 的 iPhone 应用程序，以帮助测试和准备人们期待已久的将于明年全面改版的 Siri。【原文：Apple Inc. has developed a ChatGPT-like iPhone app to help test and prepare for a long-anticipated overhaul of Siri coming next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: ISS 对 Cenovus 公司收购 MEG 能源公司的提议表示冷淡支持
item.description: 一位著名的股东顾问建议投资者投票支持塞纳维斯能源公司（Cenovus Energy Inc.【原文：A prominent shareholder adviser recommended investors vote in favor of Cenovus Energy Inc.’s C$7.3 billion ($5.2 billion) takeover of MEG Energy Corp., boosting the oil producer’s bid to consolidate Canada’s oil sands sector.】

item.title: 加密货币 3,000 亿美元的全军覆没标志着数月来最惨烈的暴跌
item.description: 本周，加密货币价值下跌约 3,000 亿美元，原因是一波杠杆押注解体，打击了该行业最大的代币，并将市场情绪拖至夏初以来的最弱点。【原文：Cryptocurrencies shed roughly $300 billion in value this week as a wave of leveraged bets unraveled, battering the sector’s biggest tokens and dragging market sentiment to its weakest point since early summer.】

item.title: DAT 如何为美国股市带来加密货币热
item.description: 战略。Metaplanet.KindlyMD。如果你是一个狂热的股价观察者，你可能已经看到这些公司在一天之内取得了令人瞠目的涨幅。它们属于数字资产库公司这一新兴趋势，这些公司持有大量加密货币，即使其日常运营可能与加密货币或其依赖的区块链技术毫无关系。【原文：Strategy. Metaplanet. KindlyMD. If you’re an avid watcher of stock prices, you might have seen these names notching eye-popping gains in a single day. They belong to a burgeoning new trend of digital asset treasury companies, businesses that hold large amounts of cryptocurrency even when their day-to-day operations may have nothing to do with crypto or the blockchain technology it relies on.】

item.title: 电子游戏产业有问题：游戏太多了
item.description:
9月份视频游戏发布的拥挤程度说明了市场面临着更广泛的挑战

。【原文：

A crowded September for video-game releases illustrates a broader challenge in the market

item.title: 鲍曼称美联储应尽可能缩小资产负债表
item.description: 美联储负责监管事务的副主席米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）表示，美国央行应寻求实现尽可能小的资产负债表，并彻底改革其货币政策执行机制。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice Chair for Supervision Michelle Bowman said the US central bank should seek to achieve the smallest balance sheet possible and overhaul its regime for implementing monetary policy.】

item.title: Squarespace 将贷款重新定价为最低私人债务利差之一
item.description: 据知情人士透露，包括 Blackstone Inc. 在内的一批私人信贷放贷机构对 Squarespace Inc. 的一笔 26.5 亿美元的交易进行了重新定价，这是迄今为止向私募股权支持的公司提供直接贷款的最低利差之一。【原文：A group of private credit lenders including Blackstone Inc. repriced a $2.65 billion deal for Squarespace Inc. to one of the lowest spreads yet for a direct loan to a company backed by private equity, according to people with knowledge of matter.】

item.title: 加拿大避免经济衰退，但经济仍受关税 "重创
item.description: 分析师称，随着出口从关税损害中逐步反弹，加拿大经济有望在 2025 年下半年出现微弱复苏。【原文：Canada’s economy is poised for a weak recovery in the second half of 2025 as exports stage a gradual rebound from tariff damage, analysts say.】

item.title: 法国勒科尔努提议小幅调整有争议的赤字计划
item.description: 法国总理塞巴斯蒂安-勒科努（Sebastien Lecornu）对总体预算目标进行了微调，并排除了 "紧缩 "的可能性，因为他正努力争取支持，劝阻反对党议员投票让他下台。【原文：French Prime Minister Sebastien Lecornu offered minor adjustments to overall budget targets and ruled out “austerity” as he strains to build support and dissuade opposition lawmakers from voting him out of office.】

item.title: 基于之前的停摆计划，BLS 将推迟发布下一份美国就业报告
item.description: 如果劳工部遵守今年早些时候制定的运行应急计划，将于下周五发布的 9 月份就业报告将在联邦政府关门的情况下推迟发布。【原文：The September jobs report, set for release next Friday, will be delayed in the event of a federal government shutdown if the Department of Labor adheres to an operational contingency plan spelled out earlier this year.】

item.title: 据说 Noba 首次公开募股的订单量是股票发行量的 20 倍
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，NOBA Bank Group AB 在斯德哥尔摩的首次公开募股吸引了约 20 倍于可购买股票的订单，其中不包括基石投资者的承诺。【原文：NOBA Bank Group AB’s initial public offering in Stockholm attracted orders for about 20 times the stock available for purchase excluding commitments from cornerstone investors, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 赞比亚寻求在投票年实现 2011 年以来最低预算赤字
item.description: 赞比亚计划将预算赤字削减到至少自2011年以来的最低水平，这在选举年实属罕见。【原文：Zambia plans to cut its budget deficit to the lowest level since at least 2011, a rare move in an election year.】

item.title: 英国央行行长丁格拉呼吁加大减税力度，认为通胀高峰正在消退
item.description: 英国央行决策者斯瓦蒂-丁格拉（Swati Dhingra）呼吁同事们推进更多的降息措施，并预测使英国再次成为国际异常值的通胀飙升将逐渐消退。【原文：Bank of England policymaker Swati Dhingra called on colleagues to push ahead with more interest-rate cuts, predicting that a spike in inflation that has made the UK an international outlier once again will fade.】

item.title: 南非计划数周内回应美国新贸易提案
item.description: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）表示，南非正在考虑修订与美国的贸易协议，并希望能够达成缓解特朗普政府征收 30% 关税影响的条款。【原文：South Africa is considering a revised trade deal from the US and is hopeful it can agree terms that will ease the impact of 30% tariff imposed by the Trump administration, President Cyril Ramaphosa said.】

item.title: SPAC之王帕利哈皮蒂亚和李开复为人工智能和加密货币目标筹集资金
item.description: SPAC 生态系统再次壮大，有两家投资者（包括最初热潮中的一位公众人物）正在筹集资金，瞄准人工智能和其他高风险行业。【原文：The SPAC ecosystem is growing again, with two investors — including a public face of the original craze — raising funds to target AI and other risky industries.】

item.title: 阿根廷债务因 "断路器 "援助创 2022 年以来最佳一周表现
item.description: 本周阿根廷资产反弹迅猛。比索飙升了 10%，股票跃升了 7%，政府的外国债券上涨了 22%。【原文：The rebound in Argentine assets this week has been torrid. The peso has soared 10%, stocks have jumped 7% and the government’s foreign bonds have posted gains of 22%.】

item.title: 前所罗门兄弟公司债券交易员被控从事性交易
item.description: 曾在《说谎者的扑克牌》一书中大放异彩的前所罗门兄弟公司债券交易员霍华德-鲁宾（Howard Rubin）被联邦检察官指控犯有性交易罪。【原文：Howard Rubin, a former Salomon Brothers bond trader who was prominently featured in the book Liar’s Poker, was charged by federal prosecutors with sex-trafficking.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德收购公司首席执行官在黯淡时代追求三位数增长
item.description: 在布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd.）收购部门工作了近二十年的老员工阿努杰-兰詹（Anuj Ranjan）去年担任领导之后，提出了一个令人惊讶的目标。【原文：After taking the lead at Brookfield Asset Management Ltd.’s buyout unit last year, Anuj Ranjan, an almost two-decade veteran of the firm, laid out a surprising goal.】

item.title: 欧元区通胀率创五个月新高，欧洲央行将继续按兵不动
item.description: 欧元区 9 月份的通胀率可能跃升至五个月来的新高，这一数据可能会加强决策者暂时避免再次降息的决心。【原文：Euro-zone inflation probably jumped to a five-month high in September, a reading that may reinforce policymakers’ resolve to avoid cutting interest rates again for now.】

item.title: 伊拉克期待已久的石油管道重启遭冷遇
item.description: 本周，市场对伊拉克北部石油出口管道在历经两年争端后即将重启一笑置之。【原文：The imminent restart of Iraq’s northern oil-export pipeline after a two-year dispute was greeted by the market this week with a shrug.】

item.title: 内燃机产业衰退，Merz 敦促欧盟取消内燃机禁令
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希-默茨（Friedrich Merz）呼吁欧盟放弃 2035 年有效禁用内燃机的最后期限，转而允许陷入困境的汽车行业以更柔和的方式实现气候中和。【原文：German Chancellor Friedrich Merz called on the European Union to give up its 2035 deadline to effectively ban combustion engines and instead allow the troubled car industry to pursue a softer path to climate neutrality.】

item.title: 优步认为非外卖配送业务价值 125 亿美元
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc. ）的杂货和零售配送业务增长速度超过预期，这表明该公司正在努力追赶竞争对手Instacart、DoorDash Inc.和亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. sees its grocery and retail deliveries growing faster than expected, underscoring the company’s effort to catch up with rival services from Instacart, DoorDash Inc. and Amazon.com Inc.】

item.title: 里夫斯称英国 "岌岌可危 "的财政状况需要谨慎预算
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）表示，英国的公共财政 "岌岌可危"，面对工党内部的压力，她为自己紧握财政部钱袋子的做法进行了辩护。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves said the UK’s public finances are “pretty precarious” as she defended her tight grip on the Treasury’s purse strings in the face of internal Labour Party pressure.】

item.title: 金融科技股大跌，Klarna股价跌破首次公开募股价格
item.description: 上周五，Klarna Group Plc 的股价首次跌破了首次公开募股的价格，而这距离该公司首次公开募股仅过去了数周时间，因为在更强劲的经济数据击碎了人们对更大幅度降息的预期之后，金融科技股延续了颓势。【原文：Klarna Group Plc shares fell below the initial public offering price for the first time on Friday, just weeks after a blockbuster trading debut, as financial technology stocks extended a rout after stronger economic data crushed expectations for deeper interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 根据特朗普协议，ByteDance 将获得 TikTok 美国公司约 50% 的利润
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，即使在唐纳德-特朗普总统策划的交易中，TikTok 的中国母公司将多数股权出售给美国投资者，它仍可能从该平台的美国业务中获得约一半的利润。【原文：TikTok’s Chinese parent company will likely get about half of the profit from the platform’s US operation even after it sells majority ownership to American investors as part of a deal orchestrated by President Donald Trump, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 俄罗斯柴油出口增加，但燃料供应困境依然存在
item.description: 尽管俄罗斯的炼油厂继续在乌克兰无人机的猛烈袭击中挣扎，但俄罗斯的柴油和汽油运输量在 9 月份的第三周仍有所恢复。【原文：Russian diesel and gasoil shipments recovered in the third week of September despite the nation’s refineries continuing to struggle with intensified Ukrainian drone attacks.】

item.title: 破产六年后，PG&E 被提升至投资级别
item.description: PG&E Corp. 因野火肆虐而于 2019 年申请破产，惠誉评级公司将其评级提升至投资级。【原文：PG&E Corp., which filed for bankruptcy in 2019 following devastating wildfires, was upgraded to investment grade by Fitch Ratings.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心因收入担忧降至四个月低点
item.description: 由于越来越担心高物价对个人财务的影响，9 月份美国消费者情绪降至四个月来的最低点。【原文：US consumer sentiment fell in September to a four-month low on growing concerns about the impact of high prices on personal finances.】

item.title: 继布雷曼之后，瑞典央行提升邦格为第一副行长
item.description: 瑞典中央银行提升利率制定委员会成员艾诺-邦格（Aino Bunge）为第一副行长。【原文：Sweden’s central bank promoted Aino Bunge, a member of the rate-setting board, to the position of first deputy governor.】
